## {#worth-my-time data-menu-title="Are they worth my time??"}

[Keyboard shortcuts...are they really worth my time?]{.slide-title} 

. . .

<span style = 'font-size: 60%;'>`r fontawesome::fa("keyboard", fill = "#05859B", a11y = "sem")` Because both your hands remain on the keyboard, shortcuts are often **faster** than a mouse</span>

. . . 

<span style = 'font-size: 60%;'>`r fontawesome::fa("clock", fill = "#05859B", a11y = "sem")` Yes, learning shortcuts *does* take some patience and practice, but it will **save you time** in the long run</span>

. . . 

<span style = 'font-size: 60%;'>`r fontawesome::fa("globe", fill = "#05859B", a11y = "sem")` Good news: lots keyboard shortcuts are **universal**, meaning you can use them across a variety applications</span>

. . . 

<span style = 'font-size: 60%;'>`r fontawesome::fa("mouse-pointer", fill = "#05859B", a11y = "sem")` Looking for more shortcuts? **Clicking on or hovering over** menu items/buttons in many applications will reveal the corresponding keyboard shortcut</span>

## {#mac-windows data-menu-title="Mac vs. Windows"}

[`r fontawesome::fa("apple", fill = "#05859B", a11y = "sem")` Mac vs. `r fontawesome::fa("windows", fill = "#05859B", a11y = "sem")`  Windows]{.slide-title}

<span style = 'font-size: 58%;'>Keyboard shortcuts typically involve pressing two or more keys in a specific order. Most times, the key combos include at least one of the following: control, option, command, alt.</span>

:::: {.columns}

::: {.column width="50%"}
<center><img src="media/pics/mac_basics.jpeg" alt="" width="350"/></center>

<center><span style = 'font-size: 52%;'>`r fontawesome::fa("apple", fill = "#05859B", a11y = "sem")` Macs use **control**, **option**, and **command** keys</span></center>
:::

::: {.column width="50%"}
<center><img src="media/pics/windows_basics.jpeg" alt="" width="350"/></center>

<center><span style = 'font-size: 55%;'>`r fontawesome::fa("windows", fill = "#05859B", a11y = "sem")` Windows machines use the **ctrl** (Control) and **alt** keys</span></center>
:::
